ing: 1 (4 ounce) jar pimento peppers, drained and chopped
1 (8 ounce) jar mushrooms, drained and diced
des: "This is a quick and flavorful salsa, one of the few ways I can think of to use black-eyed peas. Serve it with tortilla chips or pita crisps to make a zesty appetizer."
ins: Mix the black-eyed peas, jalapeno peppers, pimentos, mushrooms, celery, onion, and olive oil together in a bowl. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
